item.title: [bro] Corrupt
item.description:
Sorcery

Corrupt deals damage to any target equal to the number of Swamps you control. You gain life equal to the damage dealt this way.

item.title: [bro] Sardian Cliffstomper
item.description:
Creature — Minotaur Barbarian

As long as it's your turn and you control four or more Mountains, Sardian Cliffstomper gets +X/+0, where X is the number of Mountains you control.

item.title: [j22] Spectral Sailor
item.description:
Creature — Spirit Pirate

Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)

Flying

{3}{U}: Draw a card.

https://twitter.com/fuzichoco/status/1590902739449810944

item.title: [j22] Kibo, Uktabi Prince
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Monkey NOble

{T}: Each player creates a colorless artifact token named Banana with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add {R} or {G}. You gain 2 life."

Whenever an artifact an opponent controls is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control that's an Ape or Monkey.

Whenever Kibo attacks, defending player sacrifices an artifact.

https://www.twitch.tv/videos/1649098495

item.title: [j22] Karn Liberated
item.description:
Legendary Planeswalker — Karn

+4: Target player exiles a card from their hand.

−3: Exile target permanent.

−14: Restart the game, leaving in exile all non-Aura permanent cards exiled with Karn Liberated. Then put those cards onto the battlefield under your control.

https://www.twitch.tv/videos/1649098495

item.title: [sld] Jace, the Mind Sculptor
item.description:
Legendary Planeswalker — Jace

+2: Look at the top card of target player's library. You may put that card on the bottom of that player's library.

0: Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order.

−1: Return target creature to its owner's hand.

−12: Exile all cards from target player's library, then that player shuffles their hand into their library.

https://www.twitch.tv/videos/1649098495

item.title: [sld] Felidar Sovereign
item.description:
Creature — Cat Beast

Vigilance, lifelink

At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have 40 or more life, you win the game.

https://www.twitch.tv/videos/1649098495

item.title: [sld] Violent Outburst
item.description:
Instant

Cascade (When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom of your library in a random order.)

Creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.

item.title: [sld] Lord Windgrace
item.description:
Legendary Planeswalker — Windgrace

+2: Discard a card, then draw a card. If a land card is discarded this way, draw an additional card.

−3: Return up to two target land cards from your graveyard to the battlefield.

−11: Destroy up to six target nonland permanents, then create six 2/2 green Cat Warrior creature tokens with forestwalk.

Lord Windgrace can be your commander.

https://www.twitch.tv/videos/1649098495

item.title: [sld] Descendants' Path
item.description:
Enchantment

At the beginning of your upkeep, reveal the top card of your library. If it's a creature card that shares a creature type with a creature you control, you may cast it without paying its mana cost. If you don't cast it, put it on the bottom of your library.

item.title: [j22] Balan, Wandering Knight
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Cat Knight

First strike

Balan, Wandering Knight has double strike as long as two or more Equipment are attached to it.

{1}{W}: Attach all Equipment you control to Balan.

https://twitter.com/m_okuma0831/status/1590902361039699969

item.title: [sld] Maro
item.description:
Creature — Elemental

Maro's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in your hand.

item.title: [p30a] Urza, Prince of Kroog
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Artificer

Artifact creatures you control get +2/+2.

{6}: Create a token that's a copy of target artifact you control, except it's a 1/1 Soldier creature in addition to its other types.

item.title: [pw22] Thought Vessel
item.description:
Artifact

You have no maximum hand size.

{T}: Add {C}.

item.title: [gdy] Braids, Arisen Nightmare
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Nightmare

At the beginning of your end step, you may sacrifice an artifact, creature, enchantment, land, or planeswalker. If you do, each opponent may sacrifice a permanent that shares a card type with it. For each opponent who doesn't, that player loses 2 life and you draw a card.

item.title: [brc] Staff of Titania
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

Equipped creature gets +X/+X, where X is the number of Forests you control.

Whenever equipped creature attacks, create a 1/1 green Forest Dryad land creature token. (It's affected by summoning sickness.)

Equip {3}

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xP8VuVCNkdk

item.title: [brr] Mesmeric Orb
item.description:
Artifact

Whenever a permanent becomes untapped, that permanent's controller mills a card.

item.title: [brr] Mystic Forge
item.description:
Artifact

You may look at the top card of your library any time.

You may cast artifact spells and colorless spells from the top of your library.

{T}, Pay 1 life: Exile the top card of your library.

item.title: [brr] Springleaf Drum
item.description:
Artifact

{T}, Tap an untapped creature you control: Add one mana of any color.

item.title: [brr] Soul-Guide Lantern
item.description:
Artifact

When Soul-Guide Lantern enters the battlefield, exile target card from a graveyard.

{T}, Sacrifice Soul-Guide Lantern: Exile each opponent's graveyard.

{1}, {T}, Sacrifice Soul-Guide Lantern: Draw a card.

item.title: [brr] Sigil of Valor
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

Whenever equipped creature attacks alone, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each other creature you control.

Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

item.title: [brr] Semblance Anvil
item.description:
Artifact

Imprint — When Semblance Anvil enters the battlefield, you may exile a nonland card from your hand.

Spells you cast that share a card type with the exiled card cost {2} less to cast.

item.title: [brr] Self-Assembler
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Assembly-Worker

When Self-Assembler enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an Assembly-Worker creature card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

item.title: [brr] Sculpting Steel
item.description:
Artifact

You may have Sculpting Steel enter the battlefield as a copy of any artifact on the battlefield.

item.title: [brr] Scrap Trawler
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Construct

Whenever Scrap Trawler or another artifact you control is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, return to your hand target artifact card in your graveyard with lesser mana value.

item.title: [brr] Runechanter's Pike
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

Equipped creature has first strike and gets +X/+0, where X is the number of instant and sorcery cards in your graveyard.

Equip {2}

item.title: [brr] Quietus Spike
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

Equipped creature has deathtouch.

Whenever equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, that player loses half their life, rounded up.

Equip {3}

item.title: [brr] Psychosis Crawler
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Phyrexian Horror

Psychosis Crawler's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in your hand.

Whenever you draw a card, each opponent loses 1 life.

item.title: [brr] Pristine Talisman
item.description:
Artifact

{T}: Add {C}. You gain 1 life.
